samples.instruction: Owner kooda sandai pottuten, ippa enna panradhu? (Chennai casual)
samples.current_output: Calm-aa irunga. Ella communication-um writing-la vachukonga - WhatsApp, SMS, email. Verbal fight-kku evidence illa. Legal action-kku written proof venum. Aduttha step-aa Rent Authority-kku complaint podunga.

samples.instruction: Rent Authority-la complaint eppadi koduppadhu?
samples.current_output: District Collectorate office-la written application kodukkanum. Required documents: 1) Rental agreement copy, 2) Rent receipts, 3) Communication proof (notices, messages), 4) ID proof. Online-lum e-district portal moolam apply seyyalam. Fee: Nominal (Rs.100-500).

samples.instruction: Business partnership dispute - partner panam thara marukkiraar
samples.current_output: Options: 1) Partnership deed terms check, 2) Arbitration (if clause exists), 3) Civil Court suit (dissolution + accounts), 4) Criminal (if cheating proved - IPC 420). Partnership deed written illaattal proof difficult. Accounts settlement mandatory.

samples.instruction: ESI card benefits ennenna?
samples.current_output: Benefits: 1) Free medical care (ESI hospitals/dispensaries), 2) Sickness benefit (70% wages), 3) Maternity benefit (100% wages - 26 weeks), 4) Disability benefit, 5) Dependent benefit (death case), 6) Funeral expenses. Salary Rs.21,000/month varai ESI applicable.

samples.instruction: Divorce-à®²à¯ wife-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®à®©à¯à®© rights à®‡à®°à¯à®•à¯à®•à¯?
samples.current_output: Rights: 1) Maintenance (permanent alimony), 2) Streedhan (gifts given at marriage), 3) Share in husband's property (if jointly acquired), 4) Child custody preference (especially below 5 years), 5) Residence right till divorce. Interim maintenance during case à®¨à®Ÿà®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯à®ªà¯‹à®¤à¯‡ à®•à®¿à®Ÿà¯ˆà®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯.

samples.instruction: e-Sevai services à®à®™à¯à®•à¯‡ available?
samples.current_output: Locations: Taluk offices, e-Sevai centres, Common Service Centres. Online: eservices.tn.gov.in. Services: Certificates (income, community, nativity), Patta transfer, Pension, Ration card, License renewals. Fee: Rs.30-100 (service based).

samples.instruction: Wrong product deliver aanadhu - return policy illaiyaam, enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Wrong product deliver aanaal return policy illa endru solla mudiyaadhu - idhu seller mistake. Consumer Protection Act-in keezh correct product or full refund ketkalam. Screenshots, photos eduthu complaint podunga. NCH, consumer forum - irandilum case podalam.

samples.instruction: Land survey eppadi seivathu? Cost enna?
samples.current_output: Apply: Taluk Surveyor office. Private licensed surveyor-aiyum hire pannalam. Government survey fee: Rs.500-2000 (area based). Private surveyor: Rs.2000-10,000. Survey sketch legally valid document - boundary disputes-kku mukkiyam.

samples.instruction: Company à®à®©à¯ data misuse à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®¤à¯ - complaint à®à®™à¯à®•à¯‡?
samples.current_output: DPDP Act 2023 (implementation started): Data Protection Board-à®•à¯à®•à¯ complaint. Current options: 1) Company grievance officer, 2) IT Ministry, 3) Consumer forum (service deficiency), 4) Court. Data breach notification: Company inform à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®¯à®£à¯à®®à¯. Consent withdrawal right à®‰à®£à¯à®Ÿà¯.

samples.instruction: Veettu owner advance-ai thiruppi thara maattengurar, agreement illa (Madurai style)
samples.current_output: Agreement illaatalum case podalam. Evidence: Bank transfer statement, WhatsApp messages, witness. Legal notice mudhalla anuppunga. Respond pannalnna Rent Authority complaint. Civil Court-lum money suit podalam.

samples.instruction: Cheating case-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®à®©à¯à®© punishment?
samples.current_output: IPC 420 (BNS 318): Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property - 7 years imprisonment + fine. Cheque bounce: Negotiable Instruments Act 138 - 2 years imprisonment + twice cheque amount fine. Civil + criminal both options à®‰à®£à¯à®Ÿà¯.

samples.instruction: Defamation-kku case podalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Civil defamation: Damages claim seyyalam. Criminal defamation (IPC 499/500, BNS 356): 2 years imprisonment + fine. Truth = defence (public interest-la sonnaal). Social media defamation-kkum apply aagum. Written complaint Magistrate Court-la file.

samples.instruction: Job maarum bodhu PF transfer eppadi?
samples.current_output: Same UAN continue aagum - transfer thevai illa (auto-transfer). Old account + new account merge: EPFO portal â†’ Online Services â†’ Transfer Request. New employer-kitta UAN kodunga. Transfer: 10-15 days. Withdrawal pannama transfer panrathu tax-efficient.

samples.instruction: Telecom/Mobile company bill dispute - enge complaint seivathu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Company customer care (written complaint), 2) Appellate Authority (company website-la details irukum), 3) TRAI (trai.gov.in) complaint, 4) Consumer forum. Wrong billing, service failure, unauthorized charges ellaathukkum complaint podalam.

samples.instruction: Salary à®¤à®° à®®à®¾à®Ÿà¯à®Ÿà¯‡à®™à¯à®•à¯à®±à®¾à®™à¯à®•, 3 months pending - à®à®©à¯à®© à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Options: 1) Written demand to employer, 2) Labour Inspector complaint, 3) Labour Court (if >Rs.15,000 dispute), 4) Civil Court recovery suit. Payment of Wages Act: Salary delay = interest + penalty. Documents: Appointment letter, salary slips, bank statements.

samples.instruction: Travel package ponathu worst experience, compensation kidaikkumaa?
samples.current_output: Yes, if: 1) Promised amenities illa (hotel downgrade, no AC bus), 2) Itinerary maatram without consent, 3) Hidden charges. Claim: 1) Package cost difference, 2) Mental agony compensation, 3) Travel Forum/Consumer Forum complaint. Evidence: Brochure, booking confirmation, photos, videos. TAAI registered agents-kitta book pannunga - better accountability.

samples.instruction: Agreement register pannama irundhaal valid-aa?
samples.current_output: 11 months-kku kuraivana agreement-kku registration kattaayam illa, but notarize panradhu nalladu. 11 months-kku mela irundhaal registration illaamal court-la valid aagaadhu. Unregistered agreement-a evidence-aa use panna mudiyaadhu.

samples.instruction: Endha kaaranangalukkaga owner evict seyyalam?
samples.current_output: Valid reasons: 1) Rent thodarndhu 3 months kattaavitta, 2) Veetai damage seydhaal, 3) Illegal activity nadathinaal, 4) Agreement terms meerinal, 5) Owner sondha use-kku thevaipattal (genuine need prove pannanum), 6) Major renovation thevaipattal.

samples.instruction: Neighbour waste en veettu pakkam podugiraar - action enna?
samples.current_output: Corporation/Municipality complaint: Solid Waste Management Rules violation. Police: IPC 268 (public nuisance), 269 (negligent act spreading disease). Photos/videos evidence. Tahsildar complaint-um possible. Fine up to Rs.5,000 for waste dumping violation.

samples.instruction: Telecom/Mobile company bill dispute - à®à®™à¯à®•à¯‡ complaint à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Company customer care (written complaint), 2) Appellate Authority (company website-à®²à¯ details à®‡à®°à¯à®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯), 3) TRAI (trai.gov.in) complaint, 4) Consumer forum. Wrong billing, service failure, unauthorized charges à®à®²à¯à®²à®¾à®¤à¯à®¤à¯à®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯ complaint à®ªà¯‹à®Ÿà®²à®¾à®®à¯.

samples.instruction: Purushan adikkuraan, enna panrathu? (Chennai style)
samples.current_output: Udane: 1) 181 call pannunga, 2) Nearest police station-la complaint, 3) Medical-la injury report vaangunga, 4) Photos edunga. Protection order 2-3 days-la kidaikkum. Safe place-kku ponga - women's shelter undu.

samples.instruction: Health insurance cashless reject aanaal reimbursement kidaikkumaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. Cashless rejection â‰  claim rejection. Pay hospital, submit bills to insurer. Reimbursement claim: 15-30 days. Rejection-kku: IRDAI complaint, Ombudsman, Consumer forum. Pre-authorization issues: TPA (Third Party Administrator) contact. Network hospital outside-um claim possible.

samples.instruction: Chit fund company panam thara marukkiradhu - complaint enge?
samples.current_output: Registered chit: Registrar of Chits (District). Unregistered: Police (cheating), Economic Offences Wing. TN Chit Funds Act violation. Consumer forum-um possible. Documents: Chit tickets, receipts, agreement. Collective complaint stronger.

samples.instruction: Wrongful termination-kku enna seyyalam?
samples.current_output: Options: 1) Labour Commissioner complaint, 2) Labour Court (Industrial Disputes Act), 3) Civil Court. Remedies: Reinstatement, back wages, compensation. Document everything: Termination letter, emails, performance records. Time limit: 3 years from termination date.

samples.instruction: Podhu paathaiyai block pannitaanga - yaarai approach panrathu?
samples.current_output: Public road block: Corporation/Panchayat complaint. Right of way dispute: Tahsildar. Private encroachment on public land: Police + Revenue Department. Court: Easement right case. Documents: Old survey records, photos of traditional path use.

guidelines:
